description:
The popularity of the comedy show, Poo-tan, gets under Yamaguchi`s skin, and he goes deep into critical analysis to find out why.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment Yamaguchi cherche à apprécier Poohtan
Heartwarming Hilarious Comedy Pootan Episode 206 / Heartwarming Hilarious Comedy Pootan Episode 782
Honobono Bakushou Comedy Puutan Dai 206 Kai / Honobono Bakushou Comedy Puutan Dai 782 Kai
ほのぼの爆笑コメディ プータン 第206回 / ほのぼの爆笑コメディ プータン 第782回
